title: Usborne Greek Myths For Young Children
description: This illustrated book is a retelling of Greek myths, full of brave heroes, terrifying monsters, powerful gods and goddesses, battles and great adventures.About the Greek mythsGift of firePandora's boxPersephone and the seasonsStory of ArachneMany tasks of HeraclesEcho and NarcissusDaedalus and IcarusBellerophon and the flying horseJason and the golden fleeceKing MidasAdventures of PerseusChariot of the sunAdventures of OdysseusTheseus and the MinotaurPygmalion and his wifeEros and PsycheGreek names
author: Heather Amery
